channel.title: !adding a server restart timer for players to see!
channel.description: ok what i want is a timer that counts from 100 min (my server auto restarts every 100min) . i want it to show some where while playing on the client and i want it to send a message 1 minute till restart to all players. what should i do? my source is delta/warscape.

item.title: !adding a server restart timer for players to see!
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ohh thanks! if my server restarts every 100 min do i change this:
if(restart == time here remember to divide by 2!)
to this:
if(restart == 50)

or what

item.title: !adding a server restart timer for players to see!
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

[code]
public int restart = 0; // Top of client class

restart += 1; // This and after in the process void
if(restart == time here remember to divide by 2!) { // djdoyle1
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
PlayerHandler.msgToAll = “SYSTEM UPDATE”;
misc.println("[Antilag]: Kicking nulls");
PlayerHandler.kickNick = null;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = “null”;
misc.println("[Antilag]: Saving all games");
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println("[Antilag]: Process Done!");
}[/code]

item.title: !adding a server restart timer for players to see!
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

Ok, you know when there is an update in runescape? It is written System update in : (Countdown here)

There is a control panel on the web, called ipanel, that does the same thing… You could try that. It is not automatically tho, but if you are good with bats I think you will handle that. Or maybe you could take the System update code and use it for your own interests.

Read full topic

@b15 wrote:

i have a restarter called roflmao456’s Server Restarter . i want to have a countdown on the bottom left. just like when ur in wild and it says “wild” in bottom right corner. is this possible. i have seen other servers have a count down that says “Server Restarting in: 20 min” and it counts down how do i add this?

item.source: !adding a server restart timer for players to see!

item.title: !adding a server restart timer for players to see!
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Idk a command which restarts your server automatically
but i know a command which just warns the player that your server will restart in 30 secs:

if(command.startsWith("update")&& playerRights >= 3) { sM("Server Will Restart In 30 Seconds"); }

Then you’ll just have to turn off and turn on your server
or use voule’s auto restarter

Read full topic
